channel.title: About on L. Brustenga i Moncusí

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a postdoc at Department of Mathematical Sciences of the University of Copenhagen in the Mathematical Biology group, where my mentor is Elisenda Feliu. Previously, I was a PhD student at Department de Matemàtiques of the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona under the supervision of Joaquim Roé. My PhD Thesis, and the slides from my defense. Research Interest My research interests are in pure and applied Algebraic Geometry.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: brust at math.ku.dk Mailing Address Department of Mathematical Sciences University of Copenhagen Universitetsparken 5 DK-2100 Copenhagen Ø
